about_the_game:
Embark on a nostalgic journey to the '90s and early 2000s with our low poly Japanese street racing game. Immerse yourself in the underground racing scene of that era, where car trading, intense solo races, garage upgrades, and vehicle tuning define the experience.

Select from an array of era-fitting low poly cars, each exuding its distinct style, and engage in exhilarating races against AI rivals. Traverse artfully designed low poly urban environments that pay homage to the past while delivering a captivating racing adventure.

As you advance, enhance your garage and fine-tune your low poly cars for optimal performance, giving you an edge in the spirited competition. Explore the city streets, set new lap and speed records, and strive to attain supremacy on the leaderboards.
detailed_description:
Embark on a nostalgic journey to the '90s and early 2000s with our low poly Japanese street racing game. Immerse yourself in the underground racing scene of that era, where car trading, intense solo races, garage upgrades, and vehicle tuning define the experience.

Select from an array of era-fitting low poly cars, each exuding its distinct style, and engage in exhilarating races against AI rivals. Traverse artfully designed low poly urban environments that pay homage to the past while delivering a captivating racing adventure.

As you advance, enhance your garage and fine-tune your low poly cars for optimal performance, giving you an edge in the spirited competition. Explore the city streets, set new lap and speed records, and strive to attain supremacy on the leaderboards.
name: JDM Euphoria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Feel the rush of '90s Japanese underground street racing. Trick out and trade cars, pimp your garages, and go head-to-head in sprints and drags. Carve your path to glory and make your mark in this immersive game!
